content: seraphina nospurratu materials 5mm hook unless otherwise noted - 3 5mm & 2 5mm worsted weight yarn in gray and small amounts of white pink & black - plus a small amount of thin red 24mm safety eyes pink safety nose or you can stitch one on thin string i used crochet thread a handful of random buttons and/or beads scissors stitch marker yarn needle stuffing worked in the round colors are up to you i m just listing the colors that i used seraphina is my own creation it is not tested s=aside from myself i have double checked the pattern but typo s can slip by please feel free to message me with any questions
